page.title: 07A SCHOOL DAY IN BASSALEG
page.content: We are in the middle infants class of Bassaleg C.V.Primary School.Every day we walk to school and play with our friends.When the bell goes we line up for assembly.We have a story and say our prayers and sing,then each class goes to work.We read and learn to write neatly and we like doing stories.We like to count and measure and learn our times tables.In the afternoon we do things like sewing,plasticine,bingo, drawing,building with blocks and we read books.We learnt about Red Indians, and our teacher told us about Joseph in the Bible.We do P.E.on Monday,and we have singing on Monday and Friday.Some of us have school dinner,and some of us bring sandwiches.Before we go home we usually have a story.
